descriptions: You can download a trial version of this app to try it for 15 minutes for free.
You won’t be charged anything when this free trial ends. You can’t make in-app purchases or use add-on content during this free trial, but you’ll keep any achievements you earn.

display_long_description:
“Wild West: The Last Cowboy” brings the legendary tension of Western duels into VR. Across dusty towns, echoing canyons, and endless deserts, wield revolvers and crossbows to face duels, Russian Roulette, and team battles where every shot matters.

Combat Experience

Quick Draw Duels: See first, shoot first. Experience the rush of a split-second showdown.

Crossbow Stealth: Use silent, piercing arrows for tactical stealth and mid-range combos with revolvers.

Russian Roulette: A psychological VR mind game, where a single bullet decides fate.

3v3 Team Fights: Coordination and roles—scout, disrupt, suppress—make the difference.

AI Battles: Adaptive enemies employ flanking, feints, and squad tactics.

Powered by Dmong Technology

Behavior-based balancing adjusts difficulty and enemy composition dynamically.

Reinforcement-learning NPCs adapt tactics to player style.

Encounter Director manages pacing and tension flow.

Quest Optimization ensures stable frame rates and crisp visuals.

In the Wild West, only those who see first, shoot first, and survive become legends.
